SITE_NAME.title: Site Name
SITE_NAME.description: Enter the default name of your website

SITE_DESCRIPTION.title: Site Description
SITE_DESCRIPTION.description: Enter the default meta description for your website

SITE_KEYWORDS.title: Site Keywords
SITE_KEYWORDS.description: Enter the default set of keywords for your website

SITE_AUTHOR.title: Site Author
SITE_AUTHOR.description: Enter the default author of your website

SITE_HOST.title: Site Host
SITE_HOST.description: Enter the HTTP Host name of the website for instance http://www.example.com/index.php would be 'example.com'

SITE_BASE_URI.title: Site Base URI
SITE_BASE_URI.description: Enter the base URI for the site, if you install twist in a folder you might want /admin e.g http://www.example.com/admin/index.php would be your main index

SITE_WWW.title: Site Use WWW
SITE_WWW.description: Redirect the user to WWW. if they are not already on that sub-domain. Also used when building the full site URL

SITE_TRAILING_SLASH.title: Site Trailing Slash
SITE_TRAILING_SLASH.description: URIs and URLs in Routes and Structure will have a trailing slash '/' suffix

SITE_PROTOCOL.title: Site Protocol
SITE_PROTOCOL.description: Select the primary protocol for the website

SITE_PROTOCOL_FORCE.title: Force Site Protocol/Prefix
SITE_PROTOCOL_FORCE.description: Redirect the user to the selected SITE_PROTOCOL and SITE_WWW prefix, changing this will require a rebuild of the .htaccess file

TIMEZONE.title: Timezone
TIMEZONE.description: Set the timezone of your website

DEFAULT_COUNTRY.title: Default Country
DEFAULT_COUNTRY.description: Set to the default country ISO code of your site

DEFAULT_LANGUAGE.title: Default Language
DEFAULT_LANGUAGE.description: Set to the default language ISO code of your site

DEFAULT_CURRENCY.title: Default Currency
DEFAULT_CURRENCY.description: Set to the default currency ISO code of your site

CURRENCY_CONVERSION_API.title: Currency Conversion API
CURRENCY_CONVERSION_API.description: Set the currency converter to use either Yahoo Currency API or WebserviceX.net Currency API both of which are free to use.

ERROR_LOG.title: PHP Error Logging
ERROR_LOG.description: Log all PHP errors to a file in app/Logs, the output can either be one file (Single) or split into Daily, Weekly or Monthly files. Single log files will be split when they reach 5MB in size.

ERROR_LOGS_MAX.title: Max PHP Error Logs
ERROR_LOGS_MAX.description: Number of PHP Error log files file keep, log files will be removed starting with the oldest first.

ERROR_HANDLING.title: Error Handling
ERROR_HANDLING.description: Error handlers are very important, stops the output of errors to the screen.

ERROR_FATAL_HANDLING.title: Fatal Error Handling
ERROR_FATAL_HANDLING.description: Fatal Error handling to output a more user friendly page in the event of a fatal error.

ERROR_EXCEPTION_HANDLING.title: Exception Handling
ERROR_EXCEPTION_HANDLING.description: Exception handling to output a more user friendly page in the event of a exception.

DEVELOPMENT_MODE.title: Development Mode
DEVELOPMENT_MODE.description: Output full exceptions and allow dumping of variables to screen

DEVELOPMENT_DEBUG_BAR.title: Development Debug Bar
DEVELOPMENT_DEBUG_BAR.description: Display the debug bar on the site when the framework is in development mode

DEVELOPMENT_EVENT_RECORDER.title: Development Event Recorder
DEVELOPMENT_EVENT_RECORDER.description: Record loading times of various parts for the framework, the results can be seen in Debug Bar and on the exception/Inspector page. (Only works when the framework is in development mode)

MAINTENANCE_MODE.title: Maintenance Mode
MAINTENANCE_MODE.description: Output the 503 SEO friendly maintenance page to all visitors of the website (search engines will not index this page)

PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT.title: PHP Memory Limit
PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT.description: Set the memory limit for all your PHP scripts that use the framework

PHP_MAX_EXECUTION.title: PHP Max Execution
PHP_MAX_EXECUTION.description: Set the max execution time for all your PHP scripts that use the framework

FILE_MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.title: Max Upload Size
FILE_MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.description: Max allowed file size of assets uploaded to the system, PHP Upload and form post limits still apply

VIEW_PRE_PROCESS_CACHE.title: PreProcess Cache Life
VIEW_PRE_PROCESS_CACHE.description: The amount of time to store a Pre Processed view cache, this cache helps speed up the processing of views

ARCHIVE_HANDLER.title: Archive Handling Library
ARCHIVE_HANDLER.description: Set the library that will handle the creation for archive libraries, PCLZip is available as a package, see twistphp.com

ASSET_THUMBNAIL_SIZES.title: Asset Default Thumbnail Sizes
ASSET_THUMBNAIL_SIZES.description: Comma separated pixel size, thumbnails of each size specified wil be created upon upload of an Asset. Can be left blank if no thumbnails are required

ASSET_THUMBNAIL_SQUARE_SIZES.title: Asset Default Thumbnail Square Sizes
ASSET_THUMBNAIL_SQUARE_SIZES.description: Comma separated pixel size, square thumbnails of each size specified wil be created upon upload of an Asset. Can be left blank if no thumbnails are required

ASSET_DEFAULT_GROUP.title: Default Asset Group
ASSET_DEFAULT_GROUP.description: Default group for assets to be uploaded and browsed

API_REQUEST_HEADER_AUTH.title: API Auth via Request Headers
API_REQUEST_HEADER_AUTH.description: The base REST controllers will require authentication to be carried out via HTTP Request Headers

API_ALLOWED_REQUEST_METHODS.title: API Allowed Request Methods
API_ALLOWED_REQUEST_METHODS.description: Comma seperated list of request methods that are enabled. Common methods: GET,POST,PUT,DELETE,HEAD,OPTIONS,CONNECT

EMAIL_MULTIPART_ENCODING.title: Default Encoding
EMAIL_MULTIPART_ENCODING.description: Set the default encoding type to use when sending emails

EMAIL_CHAR_ENCODING.title: Default Char Encoding
EMAIL_CHAR_ENCODING.description: Set the default char encoding to be used when sending emails

EMAIL_PROTOCOL.title: Email Send Protocol
EMAIL_PROTOCOL.description: Select the protocol to use when sending all emails, hook: TWIST_EMAIL_PROTOCOLS

FTP_LIBRARY.title: FTP Library
FTP_LIBRARY.description: Choose which connection library the FTP package should use, to use 'native' the ftp_ PHP functions must be installed

GZIP_COMPRESSION.title: GZip Compress PHP Output
GZIP_COMPRESSION.description: Compress all the PHP output to the browser using GZip compression, currently this setting only applies to output when served by Routes.

GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL.title: GZip Compression Level
GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL.description: Set a level between 1 and 6, 1 being the lowest amount of compression and 6 being the highest. Yopu might want to decrease the CPU load on a busy server by lowering the compression level. Default level is 6.

HTACCESS_DIRECTORY_INDEX.title: Directory Index
HTACCESS_DIRECTORY_INDEX.description: Set the index order for apache to lookup when serving a directory

HTACCESS_ETAG.title: Allow ETags
HTACCESS_ETAG.description: Allow the ETag header to be used

HTACCESS_CACHE_HTML.title: HTML Cache Control
HTACCESS_CACHE_HTML.description: Set the number of seconds for the HTML to be cached in the browser - Cache Control (max-age)

HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_HTML.title: HTML Allow Revalidate
HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_HTML.description: Allow the cached HTML to be revalidated using the last-modified header

HTACCESS_DEFLATE_HTML.title: HTML Compression
HTACCESS_DEFLATE_HTML.description: Compress the output of HTML from the server using DEFLATE

HTACCESS_CACHE_CSS.title: CSS Cache Control
HTACCESS_CACHE_CSS.description: Set the number of seconds for the CSS to be cached in the browser - Cache Control (max-age)

HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_CSS.title: CSS Allow Revalidate
HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_CSS.description: Allow the cached CSS to be revalidated using the last-modified header

HTACCESS_DEFLATE_CSS.title: CSS Compression
HTACCESS_DEFLATE_CSS.description: Compress the output of CSS from the server using DEFLATE

HTACCESS_CACHE_JS.title: JS Cache Control
HTACCESS_CACHE_JS.description: Set the number of seconds for the JS to be cached in the browser - Cache Control (max-age)

HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_JS.title: JS Allow Revalidate
HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_JS.description: Allow the cached JS to be revalidated using the last-modified header

HTACCESS_DEFLATE_JS.title: JS Compression
HTACCESS_DEFLATE_JS.description: Compress the output of JS from the server using DEFLATE

HTACCESS_CACHE_IMAGES.title: Image Cache Control
HTACCESS_CACHE_IMAGES.description: Set the number of seconds for the Image to be cached in the browser - Cache Control (max-age)

HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_IMAGES.title: Image Allow Revalidate
HTACCESS_REVALIDATE_IMAGES.description: Allow the cached Image to be revalidated using the last-modified header

HTACCESS_DEFLATE_IMAGES.title: Image Compression
HTACCESS_DEFLATE_IMAGES.description: Compress the output of Image from the server using DEFLATE

HTACCESS_REWRITES.title: Rewrite Rule
HTACCESS_REWRITES.description: A JSON string containing all the re-write rules format per rule {'rule':'','redirect':'','options':''}, use the manager to edit this option

HTACCESS_CUSTOM.title: Custom
HTACCESS_CUSTOM.description: Enter all custom .htaccess functionality here, the .htaccess file is rebuilt by TwistPHP, any changes to the file directly may be lost if rebuilt with the manager

HTACCESS_DISABLE_DIRBROWSING.title: Disable Directory Browsing
HTACCESS_DISABLE_DIRBROWSING.description: Disallow the browsing of server/site directories in the web browser

HTACCESS_DISABLE_HTACCESS.title: Disallow serving .htaccess
HTACCESS_DISABLE_HTACCESS.description: Do not allow the contents of HTaccess and HTPassword files to be served by apache

HTACCESS_DISABLE_UPLOADEDPHP.title: Disable Uploaded PHP
HTACCESS_DISABLE_UPLOADEDPHP.description: Stop PHP files being executed from within the sites upload directory

HTACCESS_DISABLE_QUERYSTRINGS.title: Disable Suspicious Query Strings
HTACCESS_DISABLE_QUERYSTRINGS.description: Disallow all page requests that contain suspicious query strings

HTACCESS_DISABLE_HOTLINKS.title: Disabled Image Hotlinks
HTACCESS_DISABLE_HOTLINKS.description: Disallow hotlinking of images from your website or server, remote image requested will not be served

HTACCESS_DISABLE_EXTENSIONS.title: Disallow File Extensions
HTACCESS_DISABLE_EXTENSIONS.description: Disallow files with the extensions from being served. Each file extension must be separated with a | symbol, Default value: bash|git|hg|log|svn|swp|cvs

SESSION_HANDLER.title: Session Handler
SESSION_HANDLER.description: Choose the PHP session handler to use, 'native' is the default builtin PHP session handler

CACHE_ENABLED.title: Cache Enabled
CACHE_ENABLED.description: Caching of data, templates and pages are handled with the Twist Cache Package. Disabling the cache will return 'null' for all cache requests, no new data will be stored. Cache files can still be removed when disabled

CACHE_DELAYED_WRITE.title: Cache Delayed Write
CACHE_DELAYED_WRITE.description: Delay writing the cache files to disk, the files will be written during the shutdown cycle of the current PHP runtime

CACHE_GB_PROBABILITY.title: Cache Garbage Collection
CACHE_GB_PROBABILITY.description: Set the probability of a user collecting garbage between 1-10 when and instance of cache is launched. Default is set to 0, will never collect garbage (Expired items deleted when next used)

DATETIME_SOURCE.title: Time Source
DATETIME_SOURCE.description: Choose where the datetime class should obtain its timestamp from

RESOURCE_VERSION_OVERRIDE.title: Resource Version Override
RESOURCE_VERSION_OVERRIDE.description: Allow calls to Resource->extendLibrary to override existing (matching) version of a file, for example jQuery v2.1.1 from the core would be over-ridden by the new jQuery v2.1.1 where as jQuery v2.1.2 would be added as a new resource.

RESOURCE_INCLUDE_ONCE.title: Resource Include Once
RESOURCE_INCLUDE_ONCE.description: When using the resource View tags, css and js resources will only be included once per page load/render.

ROUTE_CASE_SENSITIVE.title: Case Sensitive URI Routing
ROUTE_CASE_SENSITIVE.description: Enable case sensitive URI routing in the routes module, turning this off may result in multiples of a single page being indexed by search engines. This setting dose not effect the wild card portion of URIs.

RANDOM_STRING_LENGTH.title: Random String Length
RANDOM_STRING_LENGTH.description: Set the default length for the output of the Tools()->randomString() function call

USER_REGISTER_PASSWORD.title: User Register Password
USER_REGISTER_PASSWORD.description: The user must enter a password during the registration process (enables a password field on registration form)

USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE_EMAIL.title: Send Password Change Email
USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE_EMAIL.description: Determine if an email should be send when a user changes their account password (Excludes password reset)

USER_AUTH_HASH_COST.title: Password Hash Cost
USER_AUTH_HASH_COST.description: Denotes the algorithmic cost that should be used. PASSWORD_BCRYPT is used to create new password hashes using the CRYPT_BLOWFISH algorithm

USER_AUTH_LEGACY_HASH.title: Legacy Password Hash
USER_AUTH_LEGACY_HASH.description: The hash algorthum used for users passwords before the user of PASSWORD_BCRYPT introduced in TWISTPHP 3.1.0. Passwords will be converet to a new hash upon successful login.

USER_AUTO_AUTHENTICATE.title: Auto Authenticate
USER_AUTO_AUTHENTICATE.description: Automatically log the user in upon successful registration. This will only work if USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION is 'off' and USER_REGISTER_PASSWORD is 'on'

USER_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH.title: Min Password Length
USER_MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH.description: Set the minimum password length to allow

USER_COMMON_PASSWORD_FILTER.title: Common Password Filter
USER_COMMON_PASSWORD_FILTER.description: Stop the user from using any of the top 10,000 most common passwords

USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION.title: Verify Email
USER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION.description: Verify a registered user by email before they can login to their account

USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE.title: Force Temporary Password Change
USER_PASSWORD_CHANGE.description: Require a user to change there password upon login (if the password is a temporary one)

USER_REMEMBER_LENGTH.title: Remember Length
USER_REMEMBER_LENGTH.description: Set the time in Hours (Default: 168, which is 7 Days in Hours)

USER_LEVEL_MEMBER.title: User Level (Member)
USER_LEVEL_MEMBER.description: Level (integer) of a member user used to restrict access through routes

USER_LEVEL_ADVANCED.title: User Level (Advanced)
USER_LEVEL_ADVANCED.description: Level (integer) of a advanced user used to restrict access through routes

USER_LEVEL_ADMIN.title: User Level (Admin)
USER_LEVEL_ADMIN.description: Level (integer) of a admin user used to restrict access through routes

USER_LEVEL_SUPERADMIN.title: User Level (Super Admin)
USER_LEVEL_SUPERADMIN.description: Level (integer) of a super admin user used to restrict access through routes

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL.title: Enable TwistProtect Firewall
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL.description: Enable the firewall that will block visitors that are up to no good

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_FAILTYPES.title: Fail Types
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_FAILTYPES.description: Registered fail attempt types, set a soft limit to 0 will disable the type

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_INITIAL_BAN.title: Initial Ban (Seconds)
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_INITIAL_BAN.description: Time in seconds to soft ban a user (TwistProtect Firewall)

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_FULL_BAN.title: Full Ban (Seconds)
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_FULL_BAN.description: Time in seconds for a full ban to last, set to 0 for permanent ban (TwistProtect Firewall)

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_MAX_SOFTBANS.title: Maximum SoftBans
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_MAX_SOFTBANS.description: Amount of soft bans before a full ban is put in place (TwistProtect Firewall)

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_RESET_AFTER_DAYS.title: Reset After X Days
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_RESET_AFTER_DAYS.description: Reset visitor ban history after X days of last ban (TwistProtect Firewall)

TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_RESET_AFTER_SUCCES.title: Reset After Success
TWISTPROTECT_FIREWALL_RESET_AFTER_SUCCES.description: Reset soft ban limits after visitor's successful login

TWISTPROTECT_SCANNER_REPORT_EMAIL.title: Send Scanner Report (Email)
TWISTPROTECT_SCANNER_REPORT_EMAIL.description: The email address to send the scanner report to, leave blank and no report is sent (TwistProtect Scanner)
